sys_element_mapping.value:
Dear Parents,Trigger - Record Created or Updated➛...➛Guardian Name

We are pleased to inform you that your child's admission request has been successfully processed. Welcome to Delhi Public School!Trigger - Record Created or Updated➛...➛Student Name:Admin number is 

Below, you will find a link with more information regarding the school's fee structure and other important details.

  • Joining Date: July 6th..
  • Term 1 Fee Due Date: Please ensure that the Term 1 fee is paid by Monday, July 20th.
  • Student Exams: The first term exams are scheduled to begin on August 25th.

We are excited to have your child as part of our school community, and we look forward to a great year ahead.

Warm regards,
Delhi Public School Administration
{{Created or Updated_1.current.status}}=requested for approval^NQ{{Created or Updated_1.current.status}}=rejected

sys_element_mapping.value:
Dear Parents,Trigger - Record Created or Updated➛...➛Guardian Name

We are pleased to inform you that your child's admission request has been successfully processed. Welcome to Delhi Public School!Trigger - Record Created or Updated➛...➛Student Name:Admin number is 

Below, you will find a link with more information regarding the school's fee structure and other important details.

  • Joining Date: July 6th..
  • Term 1 Fee Due Date: Please ensure that the Term 1 fee is paid by Monday, July 20th.
  • Student Exams: The first term exams are scheduled to begin on August 25th.

We are excited to have your child as part of our school community, and we look forward to a great year ahead.

Warm regards,
Delhi Public School Administration
{{Created or Updated_1.current.status}}=requested for approval^NQ{{Created or Updated_1.current.status}}=rejected
